column4: Fake reviewers snared in NY Attorney General yogurt sting
column5: Nineteen companies caught writing fake reviews on websites such as Yelp  Google Local and CitySearch have been snared in a year-long sting operation by the New York Attorney General  and will pay $350 000 in penalties.
